text: Shaun Ross is an American model. He is known for being the first male albino model. He has modeled for Alexander McQueen and Givenchy. Ross was on the Tyra Banks Show in 2009. Ross is in the 2013 Beyonc√© video "Pretty Hurts". ==Personal life== Ross is gay. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Gay men Category:LGBT African-Americans Category:LGBT models Category:Models from the Bronx
title: Shaun Ross (model)
